abstract: As it scrambles to avoid defeat in its battle with Microsoft, Yahoo may try to seek more time to find other partners or persuade Microsoft to raise its offer.
snippet: As it scrambles to avoid defeat in its battle with Microsoft, Yahoo may try to seek more time to find other partners or persuade Microsoft to raise its offer.
lead_paragraph: As it scrambles to avoid defeat in its battle with Microsoft, Yahoo may try to put a little more time on the clock.

headline.main: Yahoo Looks at New Way to Survive
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Seeks Way to Block Microsoft

abstract: A Google executive, Sheryl Sandberg, will join Facebook later this month as chief operating officer and will work closely with Mark Zuckerberg, Facebook’s co-founder.
snippet: A Google executive, Sheryl Sandberg, will join Facebook later this month as chief operating officer and will work closely with Mark Zuckerberg, Facebook’s co-founder.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Mark Zuckerberg of Facebook is not stepping aside for a chief executive as Larry Page and Sergey Brin did at Google or as Jerry Yang and David Filo did at Yahoo. He is following the Bill Gates model and holding the top post as he hires a Google executive, Sheryl Sandberg, as chief operating officer.

headline.main: Facebook Hires a Google Executive as No. 2
headline.print_headline: Facebook Hires a Google Veteran, Sheryl Sandberg, as Its Operating Chief

byline.original: By Brad Stone and Miguel Helft

abstract: Mark Zuckerberg of Facebook is not stepping aside for a chief executive as Larry Page and Sergey Brin did at Google or as Jerry Yang and David Filo did at Yahoo. He is following the Bill Gates model and holding the top post as he hires a Google executive, Sheryl Sandberg, as chief operating officer.
